aboutText: Hi, I'm Aarnav Sanghvi and I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for learning, curiosity, and creativity. I've been coding in languages like C, C++, and C# for years, and I'm always up for a challenge. In my free time I like to read, go biking, and eat delicious food. If I'm not working on a project I'm probably making an awesome meal. I'm a fun, happy, nice, and cool guy who loves to connect with people and find creative solutions to problems. My experience in coding and my love of learning makes me an ideal candidate for any software engineering position.
